data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in El Oro.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of El Oro, Ecuador
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of El Oro words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of El Oro.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of El Oro to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Jew, Spanish-speaking people. Make the Jew, Spanish-speaking people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in El Oro.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in El Oro, Ecuador from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of El Oro.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.
